title: Alexander Wehrle
summary: Alexander Wehrle ([ˌalɛˈksandɐ veːɐ̯lə]; born 11 February 1975) is a German sports administrator who has served as the chairman of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart since 2022. From 2013 to 2022, he worked as the managing director of 1. FC Köln. Wehrle is part of the executive committee of the Deutsche Fußball Liga.
